intro: Eriocaulon deslandesii, commonly known as the slender spike-rush, is a species of flowering plant in the family Eriocaulaceae. It is a small, herbaceous perennial that typically grows in wet or marshy environments. The plant features a dense, grass-like foliage with narrow, linear leaves. Its inflorescence consists of a spike of small, white to pale green flowers. Eriocaulon deslandesii is often found in tropical and subtropical regions, where it thrives in humid, nutrient-rich soils.
